name: Furious Bike Race 2017
description: Bike Racing is extreme 3D bike racing game. One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based game with stunning Graphics, thrilling environment and high quality Motor sound effects with insane speed on road. Bike Stunt Racing and ride on this Challenging Racing game! Moto Bike is one of the most exciting ride oriented game you for our users. bike racing is the best choice of bike riding lovers and that is one of the excellent game to other different bike riding era game. This game you will experience a best ride of your life by just playing.Now your dream is going to come true! Because many asphalt super-fast bikes are waiting for you! Which racing super bike do you like best? Get in it nearly and start up your fast bike!This crazy bike is full of packed with challenging levels.Be the crazy rider and Enjoy the speed because the much your bike speed the better you score earn.
